How did you install the build?  Did you just unzip into a clean directory and
run? Did you install any other plugins?
Yes, a fresh installation, without any other plugins.

Now invalid.  We no longer depend on the xerces plugin, so will no longer fail
if there is a conflicting version of xerces in the boot classpath on startup.

causedBy.message: Fatal Error: Unable to locate matching org.apache.xerces plug-in.
